node.text: NoteWelcome to Channels Live! Weixin prohibits live streaming by minors, solicitation of viewers for private transactions by hosts, and any illegal activities, including spreading lewd content, engaging in fraud, smoking or alcohol abuse. Be cautious to avoid property and personal loss. Report to us if you find any violations.

node.content-desc: 多元主播招募,开播领取奖励, double tap it to go to My Profile
